description: Operators that apply the Fragile debuff to make enemies take more damage

gnosis: 60% fragile to frozen enemies and 30% to cold enemies after module
shamare: 33% fragile to those with less tha 40% HP in attack range
suzuran: 25% fragile on skill activation in a large area

lucilla: Applies 18% fragile to non-elite non-boss enemies (So the least useful group of enemies to fragile is fragiled)
